works.description: The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "Photographer Jack Radcliffe has allowed the world into the most personal moments of his life as he photographs his daughter Alison throughout her childhood and into adulthood."
The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "Hortal is a contemporary artist who hails from Berlin, Germany."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "NYC-based company NewlyMaid has created a system that allows former bridesmaids to trade in their old worn bridesmaid dresses for a discount on a NewlyMaid dress."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "Successful entrepreneurship begins with an innovative idea; however, execution of an idea requires business savvy, strategic thinking and careful planning."
The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "These photos are fun and insightful, offering so much more personality than a traditional portrait."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "Elastic bands can be used for more than simply tying your hair back, and these bold band concepts demonstrate how far you can stretch certain materials."

The published article is infringed by the text excerpted on the site, beginning with the text "The Beachwear: More is More editorial for Marie Claire Italy is a simple, sultry and stunning ensemble of fierce beach fashion."
